lessons.title: What did you do last weekend?
lessons.objective: To talk about activities from the previous weekend using simple past tense.

cards.example_sentence: ¿Qué hiciste el fin de semana pasado?
cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. Usually combined with 'pasado' (past) to refer to the last weekend.

cards.example_sentence: Fui al cine con mis amigos.
cards.grammar_explanation: Past tense of the verb 'ir' (to go).
Past tense of the verb 'ver' (to see).
Past tense of the verb 'comer' (to eat).

cards.example_sentence: Descansé en casa todo el día.
cards.grammar_explanation: Past tense of the verb 'descansar' (to rest).
Past tense of the verb 'trabajar' (to work).

cards.example_sentence: Estudié para el examen de español.
cards.grammar_explanation: Past tense of the verb 'estudiar' (to study).

cards.example_sentence: Hablé con mi familia por teléfono.
cards.grammar_explanation: Past tense of the verb 'hablar' (to talk).

cards.example_sentence: Salí con mis amigos el sábado por la noche.
cards.grammar_explanation: Common phrase to describe companionship.

cards.example_sentence: Me quedé en casa viendo películas.
cards.grammar_explanation: Means ‘at home’ or ‘in the house’.

lessons.title: Birthday Celebrations
lessons.objective: To discuss birthday celebrations and related activities.

cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. Can also mean 'birthday party'.

cards.example_sentence: Tuve una fiesta para mi cumpleaños.
cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. Often includes food, music, and friends.
Masculine noun. Can be a physical item or an experience.

Feminine plural noun. Represents the age of the person.

cards.example_sentence: Vamos a celebrar mi cumpleaños en un restaurante.
cards.grammar_explanation: A verb meaning to do something special for an event.

cards.example_sentence: Pasé mi cumpleaños con mi familia.
cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. Important part of celebrations.

cards.example_sentence: Invité a mis amigos a mi fiesta.
cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine plural noun. Companions and social support.

Standard birthday greeting.

lessons.title: Planning a Vacation
lessons.objective: To discuss plans and expectations for an upcoming vacation.

cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine plural noun. Usually refers to a longer break.
A verb used for longer trips.
Masculine noun. Means of transport.

cards.example_sentence: Nos quedaremos en un hotel cerca de la playa.
cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. Place to stay.

cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. Popular vacation destination.

lessons.title: Discussing Holidays
lessons.objective: To exchange information about holidays and traditions.

cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. A day of celebration or remembrance.

cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. Christian holiday.

cards.example_sentence: Celebramos el Año Nuevo con fuegos artificiales.
cards.grammar_explanation: Masculine noun. Celebration of a new calendar year.

Masculine plural noun. Often exchanged during holidays.

cards.grammar_explanation: Feminine noun. Special dishes prepared during holidays.
